LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.label: creazione di un legame
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[human_nameFull] formando un profondo leame con [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] sembra addormentato ed ebbro di amore.
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] si erge maestosamente e con aria nobile.
LanguageData.BecameLover.label: innamorarsi
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] sussurrando dolci parole nell'orecchio di [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] tenendo [secondPawn_nameFull] per mano fino al letto [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->mentre entrambi sono bagnati di sudore
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] non toglie di occhi di dosso da [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Breakup.label: separazione
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] sedendosi con [secondPawn_nameFull] per una discussione spiacevole [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->in un momento di grande tristezza
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->mentre gli altri guardano da lontano, imbarazzati
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->mentre gli altri guardano da lontano
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] ride e piange allo stesso tempo.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] non ha piu' nessuna espressione, per lo shock.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] e' collassato(a) al suolo in un mucchio tremolante.
LanguageData.Marriage.label: matrimonio
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] facendo voto di matrimonio con [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] camminando lungo la navata con [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] tenendo le mani di [secondPawn_nameFull] durante la loro cerimonia di matrimonio [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] non toglie di occhi di dosso da [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
